description:
I love it when a model has no fear or nerves about getting Serviced.
Trever clearly got way into this video, and I am pretty sure he loved having his dick sucked...and his ass played with.
When I watch this video, I look at him and think, "Damn, I could have pushed it further." But as usual, I am so focused on his dick and ass that I am not really watching his reactions.
He makes awesome facial expressions, but his breathing didn't tell me to "push it."
This is a rock-solid Serviced video with lots of ass play and eating, and I love a guy who is easy to make nut!
Trever seems open-minded. Not sure he will do more than get his dick sucked, but I am thinking he might go all the way with a guy for us.
So stay tuned and keep your fingers crossed!
title: Bryan & Trever - Serviced
